title: Mr.corol
author: Mr.corol
content: A friend of mine was very much addicted to this game and used to spend whole day playing various games like pubg free fire. I said to my friend what's the point of you playing so many games. Just top up the game and waste money.So I gave a suggestion to my friend, friend, you waste your time playing games all day long. That's the time you can come to bitcoin form and discuss bitcoin with everyone. And once you know what Bitcoin is, you can invest. I told my friend that bitcoin is a digital crypto currency. Which will pump a lot at one time. Now if you invest in Bitcoin, you can get a lot of profit at one time. I want to know if it is appropriate to give this advice to my friend?

comments.author: I_Anime
comments.body: The advice is a good one but playing and spending money on games is not really a waste. Bitcoin is not gonna pump at one time because it has already pump more than once and it still gonna pump more again. Also Bitcoin is not just for investment there are other use of Bitcoin and also bitcoin can be used for payment for games using Binance exchange, bitpay and others

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Even if he should come to bitcointalk he still have to wait a little while before he can engage in discussions because he needs to first know what Bitcoin is and also learn some of the basic stuff there is to learn to be able to discuss effectively. And besides even if he invest in Bitcoin he'd still have to be patient with the market. So, during that waiting and learning time he could also engage in games that do pay its those participating in it. He can be earning from gaming and at the same time be learning about Bitcoin because he won't be spending the whole day here on Bitcointalk he still have to take some time off and gave his real life.

comments.author: $crypto$
comments.body: I understand how it will be very difficult for gamers to get involved in this matter of understanding bitcoin, for example, because it will take a long time to learn it, even if your intention is good to invite friends to invest in bitcoin and learn about it, but it has to be slow and willing, but don't force it all because a gamer will still love what he plays even though he has spent a lot of money to top up.You also have to tell them how bitcoin can go down drastically too, don't let him get the wrong idea just because you want bitcoin to pump all at once then get it for all at once then it's not right to keep on processing and the most important thing is to practice patience.

comments.author: cabron
comments.body: Everyone has a different world. I wouldn't be surprised if your friend just shrugs his should and resume playing pubg again after hearing what you said. Because you sound like you are going to sell something after this pitch.If this friend of yours is into games, it would be best to introduce the play to earn games in crypto. But I'm sure he heard of this stuff already. If he wasn't playing those games still then your friend is not interested in making money in crypto.

comments.author: Ucy
comments.body: Quote from: Mr.corol on March 02, 2023, 04:59:01 PMA friend of mine was very much addicted to this game and used to spend whole day playing various games like p**b*g free fire. I said to my friend what's the point of you playing so many games. Just top up the game and waste money.So I gave a suggestion to my friend, friend, you waste your time playing games all day long. That's the time you can come to bitcoin forum and discuss bitcoin with everyone. And once you know what Bitcoin is, you can invest. I told my friend that bitcoin is a digital crypto currency. Which will pump a lot at one time. Now if you invest in Bitcoin, you can get a lot of profit at one time. I want to know if it is appropriate to give this advice to my friend?Well, first of all I think it's important to be sure Bitcoin is his/her kind of thing. One of the best ways to know this is to let him/her know why Bitcoin was invented. If he buys into it then you could encourage him to contribute to the continuous development of Bitcoin either through financial contributions/investment or by participating directly in the development of the system. He can also be taught to use it for transactions. Ofcourse, you can let him know about the financial benefits and the profitability of Bitcoin investments... and how to minimize investment risk and maximize profit. There is always the right time to invest and the right time to take profit when he needs to.Don't serve money, instead let money serve you. To be served by money is to do your job/work really well that people come looking for you very willing to pay whatever is right for your products. You are in control when this start happening.

comments.author: Fiatless
comments.body: Quote from: Mr.corol on March 02, 2023, 04:59:01 PMA friend of mine was very much addicted to this game and used to spend whole day playing various games like pubg free fire. I said to my friend what's the point of you playing so many games. Just top up the game and waste money.So I gave a suggestion to my friend, friend, you waste your time playing games all day long. That's the time you can come to bitcoin form and discuss bitcoin with everyone. And once you know what Bitcoin is, you can invest. I told my friend that bitcoin is a digital crypto currency. Which will pump a lot at one time. Now if you invest in Bitcoin, you can get a lot of profit at one time. I want to know if it is appropriate to give this advice to my friend?Your advice is not a bad one at all. Many people waste their time on activities that is not beneficial. It is not bad to play games but it's abnormal to be addicted to it. You introduced him to the forum and encouraged him to learn about Bitcoin which would be to his advantage in the future. But he shouldn't see bitcoin investment as a money doubling investment but a long time business. And he should gain knowledge before he invest in the sector.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Quote from: Mr.corol on March 02, 2023, 04:59:01 PMA friend of mine was very much addicted to this game and used to spend whole day playing various games like pubg free fire. I said to my friend what's the point of you playing so many games. Just top up the game and waste money.So I gave a suggestion to my friend, friend, you waste your time playing games all day long. That's the time you can come to bitcoin form and discuss bitcoin with everyone. And once you know what Bitcoin is, you can invest. I told my friend that bitcoin is a digital crypto currency. Which will pump a lot at one time. Now if you invest in Bitcoin, you can get a lot of profit at one time. I want to know if it is appropriate to give this advice to my friend?Giving your friend this type of advice will only make him come into crypto with the wrong mindset., you told him that bitcoin is a digital currency that pumps alot of times, and when it pumps, he gonna make alot of profit - this is a wrong way to explain bitcoin to a newbie, with this type of explanation, your friend might probably jump in and buy bitcoin with tht intention of becoming really rich over night or in the short period of time, you and I know that is not how things work around here with bitcoin.Always let those you are are introducing bitcoin to, know that bitcoin. Is a long term investment, and not some thing they can hop on today and expect to make alot of money tomorrow.

comments.author: Zaguru12
comments.body: Quote from: Fiatless on March 02, 2023, 06:31:10 PMYour advice is not a bad one at all. Many people waste their time on activities that is not beneficial. It is not bad to play games but it's abnormal to be addicted to it. You introduced him to the forum and encouraged him to learn about Bitcoin which would be to his advantage in the future. But he shouldn't see bitcoin investment as a money doubling investment but a long time business. And he should gain knowledge before he invest in the sector.It was actually a great idea introducing his friend to bitcoin but gaming doesn’t seem to be a useless activity in this current generation. There many people that got addicted to playing it and became developers of it. Recently they have been competitions set aside for games to earn money just like sport. The most notable one is the game organized by FIFA over the world where young gamer’s are payed huge amounts after winning. This idea by FIFA has made some football clubs to recruit young lads to represent them in the competition.One shouldn’t force people fully into bitcoin but it can be thought as basics of storing ones funds. And not heavily having to invest in it.

comments.author: Bananington
comments.body: Gamers love their gaming consoles so much that it is almost impossible to convince a gamer to completely stop gaming and focus on another thing like engaging in the exchange of knowledge in a forum like this, to them this may just be boring or will become boring to them in a very short time and then they go back to gaming. You can rather suggest to them to consider creating time to learn another thing where you then suggest bitcoins and this forum perhaps with the opportunity of the moment. That way they may see the need to create time for something new while they still enjoy their games.

comments.author: rendravolt
comments.body: That's indeed good advice for your friends, but indeed playing games is a daily activity that is carried out by small children to adults and it becomes part of our daily lives to relieve fatigue. I also have several friends who play mobile games every day, but what makes me confused is why they don't feel bored even though they play almost 2 hours to 8 hours every day. I also suggested that they learn about bitcoin and get profit through bitcoin, but that didn't last long and most of them returned to their previous activities playing games for hours every day.

comments.author: cryptomaniac_xxx
comments.body: Quote from: Mr.corol on March 02, 2023, 04:59:01 PMA friend of mine was very much addicted to this game and used to spend whole day playing various games like pubg free fire. I said to my friend what's the point of you playing so many games. Just top up the game and waste money.So I gave a suggestion to my friend, friend, you waste your time playing games all day long. That's the time you can come to bitcoin form and discuss bitcoin with everyone. And once you know what Bitcoin is, you can invest. I told my friend that bitcoin is a digital crypto currency. Which will pump a lot at one time. Now if you invest in Bitcoin, you can get a lot of profit at one time. I want to know if it is appropriate to give this advice to my friend?Of course, every advise is good, specially if it is about investing on bitcoin. It's just a question whether your friend are going to listen to your advise or your friend has money to invest in the first place.So it's really up to him, you have given him the right advise. So that is the best that you can do right now.I'm just thinking that he might not listen initially, but if you can show proved that you have made a lot of money in the bull run, maybe he will be convinced.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Quote from: Mr.corol on March 02, 2023, 04:59:01 PMI want to know if it is appropriate to give this advice to my friend?You're pretty much introducing a person to Bitcoin as a moonboy, not as a person who's actually interested in the movement. Why advertise bitcoin as something that would pump anyway? Knowing that nothing is guaranteed in the first place. What if it doesn't pump? What now? Now you have a friend that over invested because he trusted in you.

comments.author: panganib999
comments.body: Quote from: Mr.corol on March 02, 2023, 04:59:01 PMA friend of mine was very much addicted to this game and used to spend whole day playing various games like pubg free fire. I said to my friend what's the point of you playing so many games. Just top up the game and waste money.So I gave a suggestion to my friend, friend, you waste your time playing games all day long. That's the time you can come to bitcoin form and discuss bitcoin with everyone. And once you know what Bitcoin is, you can invest. I told my friend that bitcoin is a digital crypto currency. Which will pump a lot at one time. Now if you invest in Bitcoin, you can get a lot of profit at one time. I want to know if it is appropriate to give this advice to my friend? I know you are coming from a place that's well-meaning, and you're only concerned for your friend's future otherwise you wouldn't really say something like that to him, but I feel like the way you approached him wouldn't really sit well with him and may even stray him from your point, coz now all he's gonna think about is you not minding your business and telling him what to do. I had a friend do that to me once back then and it's a good thing we're still friends because I really got offended from the way he approached me. I also wouldn't really just haphazardly tell people about bitcoin and make it out to be an end-all-be-all investment when it's as risky as all investments go. Maybe next time talk to him in a more calm and reasonable manner, sound like you're giving advice and not reprimanding him, that's going to be a better way to approach him rather than attacking him. We don't really know his reasons for playing videogames do we? Let's be a little considerate in that case.

comments.author: lionheart78
comments.body: Quote from: Mr.corol on March 02, 2023, 04:59:01 PMA friend of mine was very much addicted to this game and used to spend whole day playing various games like pubg free fire. I said to my friend what's the point of you playing so many games. Just top up the game and waste money.A non-die-hard gamer will never see a point in why people have to spend money on the game.  Quote from: Mr.corol on March 02, 2023, 04:59:01 PMSo I gave a suggestion to my friend, friend, you waste your time playing games all day long. That's the time you can come to bitcoin form and discuss bitcoin with everyone. And once you know what Bitcoin is, you can invest.I also advice lots of people into joining the forum and read about what Bitcoin is, they all just browse for some minutes and then forget what I suggest to them.  I think it is a matter of interest and need.  If a person doesn't feel the need to invest in a cryptocurrency then no matter how we told them to instead of spending money in the game, invest in crypto, they will never listen.Quote from: Mr.corol on March 02, 2023, 04:59:01 PM I told my friend that bitcoin is a digital crypto currency. Which will pump a lot at one time. Now if you invest in Bitcoin, you can get a lot of profit at one time. I want to know if it is appropriate to give this advice to my friend?It depends on the interest of your friend.  As I stated, if he is hooked on the game, and do not have a need of extra earnings then he will never listen to you.  You should touch the part where you can get his attention.  Though I can't say it is inappropriate but you should establish a strong reason why your friend needs to abandon his gamings and focus on Bitcoin investment instead.

comments.author: Silberman
comments.body: Quote from: Mr.corol on March 02, 2023, 04:59:01 PMA friend of mine was very much addicted to this game and used to spend whole day playing various games like pubg free fire. Which will pump a lot at one time. Now if you invest in Bitcoin, you can get a lot of profit at one time. I want to know if it is appropriate to give this advice to my friend?From what you share with us it seems your friend has some problems with video games and this kind of addiction cannot be fixed by giving some advice, he needs professional help and until he is able to get rid of his addiction then he cannot think about coming to this market, because even if we assume that he is able to overcome his addiction to video games that easily he could always transfer those feelings to the market of cryptocurrencies and invest in all kind of useless altcoins and lose his money this way.

comments.author: lalabotax
comments.body: Quote from: Mr.corol on March 02, 2023, 04:59:01 PMA friend of mine was very much addicted to this game and used to spend whole day playing various games like pubg free fire. I said to my friend what's the point of you playing so many games. Just top up the game and waste money.So I gave a suggestion to my friend, friend, you waste your time playing games all day long. That's the time you can come to bitcoin form and discuss bitcoin with everyone. And once you know what Bitcoin is, you can invest. I told my friend that bitcoin is a digital crypto currency. Which will pump a lot at one time. Now if you invest in Bitcoin, you can get a lot of profit at one time. I want to know if it is appropriate to give this advice to my friend?Actually, this is a better choice to pay attention to Bitcoin than wasting time and money in playing a game.but, I don't think it will be very okay if you are suggesting him to invest in Bitcoin and tell him about how profitable Bitcoin is. But, did you also tell him about the risk? because this is also important to be understood to decrease every high expectation for him and let him learn byself to understand what Bitcoin is, how the investment is, what the profit probability is, and also the risk possibility. For, investment in Bitcoin is always involving profits and risks. Once you only told about the profits, if someday the asset is decreased because of the dropped price of Bitcoin, he will ask you much and blame you. Hopefully, this will not happen. But wisely, you also need to tell him about the volatility of the market and the ways to be more patient and not panic every time the price is decreasing, because what he needs to do is waiting for more times to wait until the price is going up, moreover during the bullish era for long term holding.

comments.author: Odusko
comments.body: You may have a good intentions about your friend diverting his attention from playing games to cryptocurrency and by so doing you want him to make efforts in learning about Bitcoin, but the manner at which you presented the whole thing make it clear that you still need some learning to do before trying teach your friend about bitcoin.First you have a sure motive and zeal to make Bitcoin or bitcointalk and other discussion forum and bitcoin investment a means to make profits quick, this mentality may burne out the motivation in both you and the friend you want to encourage to adopt bitcoin.A better way to also help your friend is to introduce him to play to earn games if he is a good game, he can earn good money from that activities.

comments.author: nurilham
comments.body: Quotemy friend advice to bitcoin Quote from: Mr.corol on March 02, 2023, 04:59:01 PMSo I gave a suggestion to my friend, friend, you waste your time playing games all day long. That's the time you can come to bitcoin form and discuss bitcoin with everyone. And once you know what Bitcoin is, you can invest. I told my friend that bitcoin is a digital crypto currency. Which will pump a lot at one time.Check again your title, mate. There is something wrong with your title.It should be 'you advice/suggest your friend about Bitcoin'. It is not 'my friend advice to bitcoin'. Anyway, nothing wrong to suggest your friend to invest in Bitcoin. But never force him to invest and let him know about the risks, too. So, you won't take responsibility if your friend fails in his Bitcoin investment in the future. You must explain to him that Bitcoin investment offers big profits but it also can make you lose your money since it is very volatile and unpredictable.
